caseStudies.title: Find My Security - Comprehensive Security Marketplace Platform
caseStudies.description: Developed a revolutionary web platform connecting security service seekers with verified security providers, training companies, and individual professionals across the UK, featuring advanced matching algorithms and comprehensive vetting systems.

caseStudies.title: Multi-Store Retail Chain Cybersecurity Overhaul
caseStudies.description: Implemented comprehensive cybersecurity solutions for a major UK retail chain, protecting 150+ stores with advanced threat detection, employee training programmes, and GDPR compliance frameworks, reducing security incidents by 85%.
caseStudies.image: <svg viewBox='0 0 400 400' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='grad1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#667eea;stop-opacity:1' /><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#764ba2;stop-opacity:1' /></linearGradient></defs><rect width='400' height='400' fill='url(#grad1)'/><circle cx='200' cy='150' r='50' fill='white' opacity='0.95'/><path d='M175 140 L190 155 L225 120' stroke='#667eea' stroke-width='4' fill='none' stroke-linecap='round'/><rect x='160' y='220' width='80' height='60' rx='8' fill='white' opacity='0.9'/><circle cx='180' cy='240' r='8' fill='#764ba2'/><circle cx='220' cy='240' r='8' fill='#667eea'/><rect x='170' y='255' width='50' height='4' rx='2' fill='#764ba2'/><rect x='170' y='265' width='40' height='4' rx='2' fill='#667eea'/><circle cx='100' cy='320' r='30' fill='white' opacity='0.8'/><rect x='85' y='305' width='30' height='30' rx='4' fill='none' stroke='#667eea' stroke-width='3'/><circle cx='100' cy='320' r='8' fill='#764ba2'/><circle cx='300' cy='320' r='30' fill='white' opacity='0.8'/><path d='M285 310 L295 320 L315 300' stroke='#667eea' stroke-width='3' fill='none' stroke-linecap='round'/></svg>

caseStudies.title: AI-Driven Smart Warehouse Automation System
caseStudies.description: Transformed a logistics company's warehouse operations with intelligent automation, implementing AI-powered inventory management, robotic picking systems, and predictive maintenance, achieving 45% efficiency improvement and £2.3M annual savings.
caseStudies.image: <svg viewBox='0 0 400 400' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='grad2' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#ff6b6b;stop-opacity:1' /><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#ffa726;stop-opacity:1' /></linearGradient></defs><rect width='400' height='400' fill='url(#grad2)'/><rect x='120' y='120' width='160' height='120' rx='12' fill='white' opacity='0.95'/><circle cx='160' cy='160' r='15' fill='#ff6b6b'/><circle cx='200' cy='160' r='15' fill='#ffa726'/><circle cx='240' cy='160' r='15' fill='#ff6b6b'/><circle cx='280' cy='160' r='15' fill='#ffa726'/><rect x='140' y='190' width='120' height='8' rx='4' fill='#ff6b6b'/><rect x='140' y='210' width='100' height='6' rx='3' fill='#ffa726' opacity='0.8'/><circle cx='80' cy='300' r='25' fill='white' opacity='0.9'/><rect x='65' y='285' width='30' height='30' rx='4' fill='none' stroke='#ff6b6b' stroke-width='3'/><circle cx='80' cy='300' r='6' fill='#ffa726'/><circle cx='320' cy='300' r='25' fill='white' opacity='0.9'/><path d='M305 290 L315 300 L335 280' stroke='#ff6b6b' stroke-width='3' fill='none' stroke-linecap='round'/></svg>

caseStudies.title: Multi-National Enterprise Cloud Infrastructure Migration
caseStudies.description: Orchestrated a complex cloud migration for a multinational corporation, moving 500+ applications to AWS with zero downtime, implementing DevOps practices, and achieving 60% cost reduction whilst improving system performance and scalability.

caseStudies.title: Real-Time Financial Analytics Database Platform
caseStudies.description: Built a high-performance database solution for a leading investment firm, processing millions of transactions daily with real-time analytics, regulatory reporting, and advanced risk management capabilities, improving decision-making speed by 300%.

caseStudies.title: HealthTech Startup MVP - Telemedicine Platform
caseStudies.description: Developed a comprehensive telemedicine platform for a UK healthtech startup, enabling secure video consultations, prescription management, and patient records integration, helping secure £1.5M seed funding and achieving 5,000+ registered users.

caseStudies.title: AI-Powered Customer Service Chatbot for E-commerce
caseStudies.description: Implemented an intelligent chatbot system for a major UK e-commerce platform, handling 80% of customer inquiries automatically, reducing response times by 90%, and improving customer satisfaction scores by 35% whilst cutting support costs significantly.
